ScreenForms

Interface InterfaceIOW


  • public interface InterfaceIOW
    Interface for Input Output Window functionality Defines common methods for all input/output dialog windows

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean confirmOperationWindow(java.lang.String title_window, java.lang.String text)
      Shows a confirmation dialog window for user approval
      java.lang.String[] getData()
      Gets data entered by the user from input fields
      int getRow()
      Gets a row number from user input Used for edit and delete operations
      void show()
      Shows the dialog window and processes user interaction
      void successOperationWindow(java.lang.String text)
      Shows a success message window after operation

    • Method Detail

      • getData

        java.lang.String[] getData()
        Gets data entered by the user from input fields
        Returns:
        array of strings with user input, or null if cancelled

      • successOperationWindow

        void successOperationWindow(java.lang.String text)
        Shows a success message window after operation
        Parameters:
        text - the success message to display

      • confirmOperationWindow

        boolean confirmOperationWindow(java.lang.String title_window,
                               java.lang.String text)
        Shows a confirmation dialog window for user approval
        Parameters:
        title_window - the title of the confirmation window
        text - the confirmation message to display
        Returns:
        true if user confirmed, false otherwise

      • getRow

        int getRow()
    throws java.io.IOException
        Gets a row number from user input Used for edit and delete operations
        Returns:
        the row number entered by user
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there's an error during input

      • show

        void show()
   throws java.io.IOException
        Shows the dialog window and processes user interaction
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there's an error displaying the window
